General.Name: Qingdao Huijintong Power
General.Description: Qingdao Huijintong Power Equipment Co.,Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of various galvanized and painted steel structures in China. The company offers lattice steel towers, UHV towers, steel tubular towers, microwave communication towers, steel poles, substation structures, electrified railway structures, wind power generation equipment, photovoltaic power generation equipment, etc. It also provides electric power tower parts, fasteners, and electric power line accessories; offshore drilling platform, production platform, marine floating structure, equipment and fittings of marine engineering, tower, metal structure R and D, ocean engineering technology R and D, and technology services; and inspection and testing services for steel structures and metal materials. In addition, the company offers new material technology R and D, technology promotion and transfer, and technical consultation services; professional contracting, labor subcontracting, project management; technology development, consultation, service, promotion, and transfer; import and export of goods; international trade; and transmission line steel towers sales. It serves State Grid, China Southern Grid, and power generation companies. The company also exports its products to Canada, Myanmar, Pakistan, Kyrgyzstan, Australia, Italy, Sri Lanka, Laos, France, Israel, Mongolia, and internationally. Qingdao Huijintong Power Equipment Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2004 is based in Qingdao, China.
